seo.title: Corniglia Maps 2025 | Village & Hiking Trail Maps
seo.description: Maps and navigation for Corniglia. Village map, hiking trails, viewpoints, restaurants, and key landmarks for easy navigation.

body.title: Corniglia Maps
body.subtitle: Navigate Corniglia's compact village, hiking trails, and find key landmarks with our comprehensive maps.

features.title: Village Map
features.description: Compact village layout from train station via Lardarina to main square and viewpoints.

features.title: Hiking Trail Maps
features.description: Detailed maps of trails to Vernazza and Manarola. Elevation profiles and difficulty ratings.

features.title: Dining Locations
features.description: All restaurants, cafes, and wine bars marked on village map with ratings.

features.title: Viewpoint Guide
features.description: Best photo locations and panoramic terraces clearly marked with optimal visiting times.

features.title: Station Access
features.description: Routes from train station: Lardarina stairs or shuttle bus pickup point.

features.title: Offline Maps
features.description: Download maps for offline use. Cell service can be spotty on trails.
